answers.answer: not much help but good luck! i have my sugars test on the 20th. im high risk also. and my mom had diabetes with all three of her pregnancies. pretty nervous myself.
Good luck! I haven't personally dealt with taking the 3 hour test but a few of my friends failed the one hour and had to do it. They said it was boring but both passed fine.
bring a friend with you so youre not too bored. ive already asked my mother to come with me to keep me company during my first test so i dont worry the whole hour on how it turns out.

Me tooHow many times can I fail this test.....Okay my dr. Call me ......He said I need to do the 3hour glucose test because I fail the 1hr test.....He said it was a little highDon't know how high :(Forgot to ask for #'sSo .....I can't  eat to much carbs and i have to watch my sugar intake till I go to do the 3 hr test :(Another Saturday morning at the lab.....Hopefully I pass this test the way I did with my past two pregnancies
You too guys my husband will go with me he went to the first one plus he'll want to be there for the ultrasound after

Just so all you guys know stressing raises your sugar levels....if you go in that morning stressing if you're gonna pass it or not you are raising your sugar levels. It is just best to keep an open mind about it and treat it like any other simple blood test!
Yeah my dr call me 2dayI was waiting for his callCuz I knew I was gonna have to do the 3hr test:(
I've done this test soo many times(3 hr test )I hate it !!!! :(

question: Sooo went to the ob today and got the results for my glucola. Normal is between 60 and 130 and mine was 790. So next week on Tuesday I have to fast after midnight go in at seven drink the stuff again then they will draw my blood at 8 9 and 10 and we'll have to see how it goes but I am high risk for it so I'm kind of freaked out. Anyone had any experience with this? On the plus side the same day they are letting me take another stab at confirming the gender so yay silver lining
title: gestational diabetes
